reviewText: saw it on PBS and wanted to have in case we wanted to plan one of the trips.
I love this dvd. like to get one for my friend. in fact, I think I will
Loved this dvd, a must have for anyone who is interested in the history of the mountains.  Great narration and scenery.

Not necessarily this vendors fault, but the resolution is very, very poor. I don't recommend this version at all! There is another version available through PBS that is considerably better . . . NOT HD but better.
